attributes.action: Consider Taxing all Caravans and Trailers incl HGV Trailers as a scorce of road fund taxation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have road users had to creep along a road because of a Caravan, or lorry towing a trailer there by causing it to be so slow that it adds to congestion.  If all trailers and Caravans were taxed it would raise revenue without the additional burden to other road users

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
